full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 42 of 261 1182 LC6Cmax1 Kate - direct 1 A. I massaged them. 2 Q. And what happened next? 3 A. And then he seemed to be very approving and he said, oh, you can go ahead and do my shoulders. 4 5 Q. Did you massage Epstein's shoulder? 6 A. Yes. 7 Q. What happened next? 8 A. He said that I was very strong and he said that he likes that I was very -- seemed to be -- know what I wanted. And they talked about something that I couldn't quite hear what they were saying about like a music producer. And then his phone rang again. 9 10 11 12 Q. After his phone rang, did you stay at Maxwell's house? 13 14 A. No. 15 Q. How did you end up leaving? 16 A. He didn't say anything. He just answered the phone and started talking on the phone and then Ghislaine sort of ushered me out. 17 18 Q. And did you leave Maxwell's house? 19 20 A. Yes. 21 Q. After you left Maxwell's house, did you hear from her again? 22 23 A. Yes. 24 Q. Approximately how long after you met Epstein at Maxwell's house did you hear from Maxwell? 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012793
